title: Azure RDP Connection with MFA enabled
author: fchaussee
body_snippet:
There's a new rdp client from Microsoft which allow to connect on Azure VM with Azure AD account MFA enabled.

In this client, there's a new option called "Use a web account to sign in to the remote computer"

Is it possible to add this feature in mRemoteNG.

Best Regards,
Fr√©d√©ric.
